Docs.param: The <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> object to which the filter is applied.
An arbitrary object used to filter the list.
Docs.summary: Represents a delegate that is used to filter a list of members represented in an array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Every derived class of a <xref:System.Delegate> and <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> has a constructor and an `Invoke` method. (See the code example in `Delegate`.)
The <xref:System.Type.FindMembers%2A> method uses this delegate to filter the list of members that it returns.
